concatTransform

public final void concatTransform(float x,
                                  float y,
                                  float scaleX,
                                  float scaleY,
                                  float rotation)
Generates matrix properties from the specified display object transform properties, and concatenates them with this matrix. For example, you can use this to generate a matrix from a display object: var mtx = new Matrix2D(); mtx.concatTransform(o.x, o.y, o.scaleX, o.scaleY, o.rotation);

Parameters:
x -
y -
scaleX -
scaleY -
rotation -

concatTransform

public final void concatTransform(float x,
                                  float y,
                                  float scaleX,
                                  float scaleY,
                                  float rotation,
                                  float regX,
                                  float regY)
Generates matrix properties from the specified display object transform properties, and concatenates them with this matrix. For example, you can use this to generate a matrix from a display object: var mtx = new Matrix2D(); mtx.concatTransform(o.x, o.y, o.scaleX, o.scaleY, o.rotation);

Parameters:
x -
y -
scaleX -
scaleY -
rotation -
regX - Optional.
regY - Optional.
